message:
Thank you for the interest in the open source #civictech tools for policy crowdsourcing and participatory budgeting.

As highlighted in the video, request the new case study on Facebook advertising for civic tech projects here: http://po.st/CFrequestinfo

The code links on GitHub:
https://github.com/CitizensFoundation/your-priorities-app
https://github.com/CitizensFoundation/open-active-voting
https://github.com/CitizensFoundation/active-citizen
